lines.text: If we had one of those Reversing Rune stickers around, we could make the hologram play backwards, and...
...maybe there'd be a clue? A secret message? Some explanation of how it got there?
Even if that didn't involve illegal use of magic items, or if it made any sense to... play a hologram backwards?
Even then, how would you stick a sticker to an intangible hologram?
Look, I'm brainstorming, here! Not every idea can be a winner!
Try brainstormin' with a smarter brain, kid.
